edu.hanover.basin.Users.Objects

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.hanover.basin.Users.Objects.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This object represents a Facebook User and the information basin has permission to access. Methods MUST only be used inside AsyncTask as it executes GraphRequests. Please note that some information is not accessible until the Facebook Review completes.
    See Also:
    AsyncTask, GraphRequest, GraphResponse

      Constructs person object to prepare it for requests.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String id)
        Constructs person object to prepare it for requests. shouldGetLikes always defaults to false; it needs to be set to true seperately since it can be time-consuming.
        Parameters:
        id - the facebook ID for the user to request data

      • User

        @Deprecated
public User(com.facebook.AccessToken accessToken)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructs person object to prepare it for requests. This method should has a redundant paramater as accessToken since the accessToken is always accessible. Use of this constructor means a newMeRequest will be made instead of a generic GraphRequest shouldGetLikes defaults to true here. Use of this is not recommended.
        Parameters:
        id - the facebook ID for the user to request data

    • Method Detail

      • startRequest

        public void startRequest()
        Call this to begin requesting user information inside your AsyncTask

      • doLikes

        public boolean doLikes(boolean should)
        Determines whether or not to also request Facebook likes for the user. This function has no effect if used after the call to startRequest()
        Parameters:
        should - true to request likes; false otherwise
        Returns:
        boolean

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> commonLikes(User user2)
        A function to get a list common likes between two users TODO: All implementation. This a stub.
        Parameters:
        user2 - a user to compare this user to
        Returns:
        List representing common likes
